coverImageAlt: 200 Main Street Unit 8B, White Plains NY
description:
Modern luxury in the heart of White Plains. This stunning 8th-floor residence at 200 Main offers an exceptional urban lifestyle with the convenience of Westchester County living. Floor-to-ceiling windows flood every room with natural light and frame sweeping views of the Westchester skyline.

The open-concept living and dining area flows seamlessly to a private balcony — perfect for morning coffee or evening cocktails. The chef's kitchen features Bosch appliances, waterfall quartz countertops, and a wine refrigerator. The primary suite includes a walk-in closet and spa-inspired bath with rainfall shower. The second bedroom is perfect for a guest room or home office.

seo.title: 200 Main Street Unit 8B, White Plains NY — $675,000
seo.description: Modern 2BR/2BA condo with city views in downtown White Plains. Doorman building, private balcony, steps to Metro-North.
